<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodline Conduit](/Feats.aspx?ID=630) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 201 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

</column>

---

Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells. If your next action is to Cast a Spell of 5th level or lower that has no duration, you don’t expend the spell’s slot when you cast it.
name: Bloodline Conduit
